content.question: The system of thought demonstrated by al-Khatib suggests he was most influenced by which of the following?

choices.label: New understandings of the natural world during the Enlightenment
Daoist understandings of the balance between humans and nature
Greek and Roman philosophical principles of logic and empirical observation
Arab interactions with Jews, Christians, and Zoroastrians in the pre-Islamic era

content.answer: Greek and Roman philosophical principles of logic and empirical observation
